thread.title: #DisneyFamilia: Planning Your Vacaciones? Here are the Best Tools to Help You!
thread.title_full: #DisneyFamilia: Planning Your Vacaciones? Here are the Best Tools to Help You!

author: Sarah Domenech
title: #DisneyFamilia: Planning Your Vacaciones? Here are the Best Tools to Help You!
text:
Are you planning your vacation to Walt Disney World Resort with your familia ? Don’t know where to start? Well, look no further than our re-imagined websites Disneyworld.com/Familia and Disneyworld.com/Family with content in Spanish and English, respectively.
The sites are great tools for families looking for information on offers, attractions and much more, including tips on how to plan your vacación !
Here are some of my favorite tips:
Estimate your budget with plenty of time. Ask your familia for their wish list, things they want to do, see and eat! Incorporate all of the findings into your vacation plan. Make sure to order your Walt Disney World Resort vacation planning video. Create your MyDisneyExperience.com account so you can order FastPasses and more! And more importantly, enjoy your vacaciones !
